description:
This canyon begins from above Holta, and can be run first by hiking about an hour above the area where the drainage meets the dam.

Approach

From above the dam, cross the river and head up the hill. Follow closely the Ridgeline above the canyon. There is a farmhouse located exactly where you drop into the canyon.

Descent

The canyon falls steeply back to the river. All drops are bolted.

Exit

You can exit at the dam if you have a vehicle there, or you can descend Holta to the thermal baths, which will add another 2-4 hours.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Trip Video:


Background

This canyon was first descended by Pascal von Duin and David Ov.
name: Gjerzeze
